properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating flight of the first Zeppelin on July 2, 1900, in Friedrichshafen, Germany, by Count Ferdinand von Zeppelin with LZ-1 airship; cancellation stamp dated July 2, 1984 in Friedrichschafen; includes information on reverse.
